NOTE: For those users who have any of the newer trial versions installed(and are getting this error message INSTALLATION ENDED PREMATURELY), here's what you need to do first before installing 7.0.0.125:

You need to remove a key ?avp6_post_uninstall? from your registry. This key is created when uninstalling an older version of Kaspersky and somehow it wasn?t removed after restarting the computer. Just follow the simple steps below on how to remove the avp6_post_uninstall key fro your registry.

1. Go to Start -> Run

2. Type regedit and click OK button.

3. Navigate to:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run

4. Expand the Run folder by clicking the + sign.

5. Right click on the avp6_post_uninstall key (folder) and select Delete.

6. Install Kaspersky product as normal. You won?t get the error ?You must restart your computer before proceeding with the installation.? and ?Installation interrupted. Installation ended prematurely because of an error.? anymore.
Works great on xp but i only got 1 day trial on Vista,why is that?

[-HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\SystemCertificates\SPC\Certificates]
[-HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\KasperskyLab\LicStorage]
